page.title: 04A PEBMARSH FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: Every Saturday my Mum and Dad and I go {shopping.}We go in my Dad's van to Halstead.We go into the butcher's and we go to Boots the Chemists and we go to International which is a big supermarket.We go into McDowell's which is a newsagents and toy shop.We buy rabbit food and pet food in Winner's,the pet shop. On Sunday I play outside on my{ {Go-cart.}My Mum cooks{lunch}for mid-day.We have roast dinner with chicken and Yorkshire pudding.Sometimes Dad works on the house and sometimes he does some{ {gardening.} After lunch I play with my remote control four-wheel drive truck.Dad reads the newspaper while Mum washes the dishes.Dad helps her sometimes,then Mum can watch television.
